en.title: New desktop version available
en.description: Desktop App v5.4 includes an improved URL validation and an improved add/edit server experience. See [the changelog](https://docs.mattermost.com/install/desktop-app-changelog.html) for more details.

en.title: Mattermost Boards will be removed on September 28, 2023
en.description: Mattermost Boards is transitioning to a fully community supported plugin. As a result, Boards will be removed from Mattermost Cloud instances on September 21, 2023. Click below to learn more about how this impacts your instance and how to prepare.

en.title: Mattermost 8.0 is here!
en.description: Mattermost v8.0 is focused on increasing your team’s operational efficiency, expanding our ecosystem, and improving our platform. [Upgrading](https://docs.mattermost.com/upgrade/upgrading-mattermost-server.html) only takes a few minutes.

en.title: Collapsed Reply Threads are here, now in general availability!
en.description:
Experience a better way to communicate in threads that keeps your channels and conversations organized.

You can now enable Collapsed Reply Threads by default for all users in **System Console** > **Posts** > **Collapsed Reply Threads**.

en.title: Now enable Collapsed Reply Threads by default for all users!
en.description: You can now enable Collapsed Reply Threads by default for all users in **System Console** > **Posts** > **Collapsed Reply Threads**.

en.title: Experience a better way to communicate in threads
en.description:
Welcome to Collapsed Reply Threads! You can now find, follow, and resume conversations more easily, and keep discussion threads focused.

You can always disable it in **Settings** > **Display** > **Collapsed Reply Threads**

en.title: Your Mattermost server version is unsupported. Upgrading is required
en.description: You are on an unsupported Mattermost server version and it’s time to upgrade! [Read here](https://mattermost.com/blog/why-to-upgrade-mattermost-server/?utm_source=inapp-self-hosted&utm_medium=popup&utm_campaign=notification-why-upgrade-blog&utm_id=nov-notifications&utm_content=notification-why-upgrade-blog) on how we have improved server performance for Mattermost users, as well as why upgrading your Mattermost server ensures that you’re getting the latest new features, security fixes, and bug fixes.
